participant_1.background:
My weekends are for relaxing and spending time with my family.
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
I'm struggling with my parents' distance, but I'm doing well in school.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

i am fluent in spanish.
I'm a mom of four who wants to do my best to protect my kids.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
I love my husband's cooking, but I'm a sucker for a good piece of chocolate.

content.text: Hi, I am doing well thank you. How about yourself?
I am doing well! I am just relaxing at home today.
I am relaxing at home too. I am a mom of four, so I try to spend as much time with them as possible.
That is great! I am going to see a concert with my friend tonight.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love concerts. I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
That's awesome! I wish I could play piano. Do you play any other instruments?
No, I just play piano. I love music, so I like to listen to it a lot.
Me too! I love all kinds of music. I am going to Japan next week for vacation!
Oh, that sounds amazing! I have never been to Japan. I would love to go someday.
I am really excited! I have always wanted to go. I am going to spend a lot of time exploring the culture.
That sounds like a great time! I am sure you will have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I am looking forward to it.
